@description.name: @description
@description.body: Basic browser detection for qooxdoo. This class is used by {@link qx.core.Environment} and should not be used directly. Please check its class comment for details how to use it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks for the name of the browser and returns it.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The name of the current browser.
@return.description: The name of the current browser.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Determines the version of the current browser.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The name of the current browser.
@return.description: The name of the current browser.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns in which document mode the current document is (only for IE).

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} The mode in which the browser is.
@return.description: The mode in which the browser is.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true, if the environment is in quirks mode
@return.description: true, if the environment is in quirks mode

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Internal helper map for picking the right browser names to check.
